TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program the Comic!* Kind of?...

Articles.Content:
First issue of "Kerbal Space Program the Comic!* Kind of?..." Utilizing advanced imaging technology (F1 key) Kerbal Scientists have decided to keep a detailed image based record of various missions featuring the Hero Jeb! Please let me know if you guys like it and I will make more issues!

Designed to be viewed best on iPad and Android tablets. Google Drive Download below. Thanks!

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B27c0WXOPc_FXzJwVVI3VVhhcm8/edit?usp=sharing
